product.prd_title: Product 1 : Modern skinny Jean - Tommy Hilfiger
product.prd_des: Hilfiger men's jean. Styled from super stretch denim in a vintage wash with authentic fading, this pair looks and feels like you were wearing them since, well, since before they were vintage. Part of our Tommy Jeans collection.

product.prd_title: Product 2 : Navy long shirt - Tommy Hilfiger
product.prd_des: Tommy Hilfiger men's shirt. Designed to be worn casually rumpled, our linen and cotton shirt is coveted for its lightweight breathability.

product.prd_title: Product 3 : Travel bag US - Tommy Hilfiger
product.prd_des: Made with miDoriÂ® bioWick, a plant-based finishing agent that helps fabric absorb sweat, wick away moisture and dry faster. Compared to standard wicking finishes it has an (up to 8 times) lower carbon footprint.
This lightweight layer was designed with a half-zip closure to throw on over your workout gear as a warm up. Made of breathable, water-repellent material for comfortable wear, rain or shine.
